thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 12 of 235
thread.title: Maria

author: Maria
title: Maria
text: I rented this hotel last minute for my husband and I for valentines day. I been meaning to rent here since it opened. It just looked nice. We got a great last minute deal. Very affordable and very nice hotel. The ladies were all very nice and helpful at the front desk. Our room was cute and comfortable Just like our own apartment. It had a stove, refrigerator , microwave and they are all brand new. The room was set up very nice and enough room to enjoy. The swimming pool and exercise room was a A + I would recommend this hotel to everyone. Thank you for a great stay . We will return
